short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our app displays the opportunity cost of items, assuming you invested the money for 10 years at 5% instead.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What Our App Does: Our app displays original price of an item right next to the opportunity cost of buying it. The opportunity cost is calculated by assuming that instead of buying the item, you invested the cost of the item for 10 years at 5% interest. 

Why to Install It: Our goal is to help you understand the true cost of your purchase to help you spend less. None of us want to stop spending, but all of us want to save money where we can.
